message:
Hey Geeksphere.

Any recommendations for a "Marketing Automation" software?

We are currently using:
* Sendy for Newsletter/blasts
* Bitrix24 for CRM
* Wordpress for website

In case background is needed about marketing automation:
http://www.marketo.com/ebooks/graduating-from-email-marketing-to-marketing-automation/

http://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing-automation
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message: Best scenario is integrating our CRM Bitrix24 where contacts are kept with Sendy - but couldn't find anything made to establish this connection yet.
How different is this from setting autoresponders in MailChimp etc? (sorry if ignorant question)
